useCase.name: Record Subject Responses
useCase.description: Allows the MRI Operator to record subject responses digitally

preconditions.precondition: The MRI Operator has access to the digital form interface

successEndConditions.condition: The subject responses are successfully saved in the Neurohub Database

useCase.trigger: The MRI Operator accesses the digital form interface to record subject responses

mainSequence.step: The MRI Operator accesses the digital form interface
The digital form interface displays the form to the MRI Operator
The MRI Operator enters subject responses into the form
The MRI Operator posts the subject responses via the form interface
The responses API saves the subject responses in the Neurohub Database
The responses API confirms the successful saving of responses in the database
The digital form interface displays a success message to the MRI Operator
